message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to start with a price of $9,500. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $9,500 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product.  What do you think?
I understand that $9,500 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll counteroffer at $8,750. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $8,750 is still a bit too high.  I'm willing to pay $8,250.  This is my final offer before I go with John.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $8,750, Bob. I'm already losing money at this point. I'm willing to make one last compromise, so I'll meet you at $8,500. This is my final counteroffer.
Alice, I really want this product, but I can't go any higher than $8,000. This is my final offer. If you don't accept, I'll have to go with John.
